about_the_game:
Elementum is a spell-crafting roguelike with elemental spells and bullet hell elements.

Gather spells, amulets and scrolls to create your own loadout!

Gather abilities, passives and stats improvements in order to define your playstyle.

Defeat all encounters in a room and choose your reward!

Collect spells, pineapples, amulets, scrolls and much more at the end of each room.

Equip your spells with unique upgrades to further define your build!

Upgrade your spells by giving them unique properties and, by doing so, create your own.

Unlock and play 4 different character classes, each one with their unique move set!

4 Playable mages, each possessing the powers of their respective element, offering an unique experience.

Key Features

  • Fast paced spell-casting combat!
  • Discover over 30 different spells and Augments that will make each run feel unique!
  • Procedural encounters and ability stats, making each run feel fresh and unique!
  • Craft your own build by gathering and equipping various spell upgrades!
  • Play as one of 4 different classes, each possessing unique properties and base loadout!
